issue.title: DRCSIM recently stopped working with Intel graphics cards

content.raw:
Using the current drcsim version from .debs ,changing the atlas.urdf directly using sudo (evil, I know) and launching gazebo with the robot using


```
#!

roslaunch atlas_utils atlas.launch
```

doesn't crash Gazebo anymore and the robot spawns. The laser scan ranges are all zeroes however, and the Gazebo terminals says:


```
#!

Error [MultiSenseSLPlugin.cpp:127] laser sensor not found
```

Any hints for solving the issue would be much appreciated. Our team really would like to do other stuff than investigating this kind of issue :)
